text.description: The text content of the label

bgColor.description: The background color, which defaults to an empty string, is not processed
bgColor.description_zh: 背景颜色，默认为空字符串，即不处理

color.description: The font color of the label is an empty string by default, that is, it is not processed
color.description_zh: 标签字体颜色，默认为空字符串，即不处理

closeColor.description: Turn off the color of the button icon

name.description: The index value returned when clicked, which is used to distinguish which element of the array was clicked
name.description_zh: 点击时返回的索引值，用于区分例遍的数组哪个元素被点击了

plainFill.description: Whether or not to fill the background color when hollowed out
plainFill.description_zh: 镂空时是否填充背景色

plain.description: Whether it is hollowed out or not

closable.description: If you can turn it off, set it to true, and a close icon will appear to the right of the text
closable.description_zh: 是否可关闭，设置为true，文字右边会出现一个关闭图标

show.description: Whether the label is displayed or not

icon.description: Built-in icons, or pictures of absolute paths
icon.description_zh: 内置图标，或绝对路径的图片

events.name: click
events.description: Click on the label to trigger

events.name: close
events.description: If closable is true, click the tab close button to trigger the trigger
events.description_zh: closable为true时，点击标签关闭按钮触发
